infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to capture and upload images when creating or commenting on work instructions.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to detect and verify employees' attendance by connecting to nearby authorized devices.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app requires Bluetooth access to communicate with BLE beacons for attendance tracking and authentication purposes.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires location access to scan for nearby Bluetooth beacons, ensuring accurate attendance tracking at designated work locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires continuous location access to detect and verify attendance even when running in the background, ensuring seamless check-in and check-out functionality.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.bluetoothAlwaysPermission: The app needs constant access to Bluetooth to connect to devices.
